title: Compact sans used in Little Yellow Jacket branding
content:
Hi,

Does anyone know what font these characters belong to? The characters in question are the large sans serif letterforms above the smaller text.

Many thanks,

Scott

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture-6.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103062947/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-6.jpg) | 215.4 KB |
| [Picture-5.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103062947/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-5_0.jpg) | 225.62 KB |
author: Scott Waring

comments.content:
FWIW: Typefaces with a structurally similar ampersand include  
 [Churchward Heading](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103062947/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/churchward/churchward-heading/), [Haettenschweiler](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103062947/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=Haettenschweiler) and [Bee Four](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103062947/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/bee_four_ot_std/?&sample_text=%26%20AFTER%20LIGHT&sample_size=144) (and [Chank Cosmic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103062947/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/chank/cosmic/cosmic/) and [California Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103062947/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/urw_california_grotesk_black/?&sample_text=%26%20AFTER%20LIGHT&sample_size=74)).
